SHR Reference Model Version 1.0.0
cimi.medication

Element Dosage

Documentation:

The dosage of the medication, prescribed or taken.

Ancestors:
  • Dosage
Used By:
  • MedicationDispenseTopic, 
  • MedicationTopic, 
  • MedicationUseTopic

    • Field Summary

      Properties Defined Constraints Value

      The amount of medication taken per dose, as a quantity or range.
